text: inerisu mets’ihafuni yemiyanebu sihonu ayihudochi፡- kirisitiyanochi beminimi layi ayidelumi alu፡፡ kirisitiyanochimi፡- ayihudochi beminimi layi ayidelumi alu፡፡ inidezihu ineziya yemayawik’uti (agariwochi) yenigigirachewini bit’e alu፡፡ alahimi beziya berisu yileyayubeti beneberuti negeri betinisa’e k’eni bemekakelachewi yiferidali፡፡
